posts.title: Internship_Day1
posts.text: 建新專案 vue create Babel Javascript to ES6 TypeScript //弱型 PWA //Progressive Web App Router Vuex //狀態 CSS Pre-processors //sass Linter / Formatter //檢查 npm install run package.json npm run serve //啟動webpack-dev-server npm run dev npm run build //打包至dist產生生產環境，帶有JS/CSS/HTML的壓縮包 生命週期 mount 渲染前後123456789methods: { initData () { this.$step(this.step) // active 步驟 1 //Vuex this.$pageId(this.id) },}mounted () { this.initData() } ES6 module import from export default router.js123456npm install vue-routerimport Vue from 'vue'import VueRouter from 'vue-router'Vue.use(VueRouter) Pug to Vue.js img@ 1img(src="../assets/images/slide__1.jpg") //pug 1img(src="@/assets/images/slide__1.jpg") //vue router-link 123a.button--xl( href="dashboard.html" //only route in router) 123router-link.button--xl( :to="'/dashboard'") input https://dwatow.github.io/2018/09-21-vuejs/vue-component-with-v-model/12//pug+form--input("手機號碼", "", "請輸入手機號碼") 12345678910111213//vue---template---FormInput( :required="true", :title="'手機號碼'" :value="formData.phone" @input="formData.phone = $event") ---script---import { FormInput, FormParents } from '@/components/_form'components: { FormInput, FormParents}, 12345678//component.vue---template---input( type="text" :placeholder="placeholder" :value="value" @input="onInput") 123456---script---methods: { onInput (event) { this.$emit('input', event.target.value) }} radio 12//puginput(type="radio" name="gender" checked) 123456//vue---template---FormParents( :value="formData.gender" @input="formData.gender = $event") 1234567891011121314151617181920//component.vue---template---input( type="radio" name="gender" :check="value === 'dad'" @input="onInput('dad')")---script---props: { value: { type: String, default: 'dad' }},methods: { onInput (value) { this.$emit('input', value) }} modal 12345a.button--xl( data-toggle="modal" data-target="#registerSuccess" href="#registerSuccess") 1234a.button--xl( href="javascript:;" @click="openModal('ModalRegisterSuccess', true)")

posts.title: book_room
posts.text: HTML <template> holds HTML code without displaying it, the content can be made visible and rendered later by using JavaScript. Vue.js component reference https://hackmd.io/SFgotrQnQwWP0H3KB1BJ1g?fbclid=IwAR0MRhMELxcQT-KQyAyPHEbCflZi9BvhfSsIcYtpEX5tNOjEHonvyY6vp8c https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uLhXpzsv5kk&t=949s

posts.title: Hello Hexo
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment

posts.title: TodoList
posts.text: A To-do-list create by Vue.js. https://github.com/InkyChew/Vue.js_todolist body中引入vue.js<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/vue/dist/vue.js"></script> Directivev-model 資料雙向綁定v-on methodv-ifv-forv-focus 自訂directive，防止多個 li 因 v-model 綁定同時修改 1234567directives: { focus: { inserted: function (el) { el.focus() } }}, v-bind:class="{'completed' : todo.completed}"use completed class ， when todo.completed == true :class 無法使用data綁定class:style 可使用data綁定class 配置方式 123456var app = new Vue({ el:'', //綁定最外層要素 data: {}, //綁定 v-model 資料 computed:{}, //即時更新的運算資料 methods: {}}) 參考資料https://peterhpchen.github.io/VuejsQuest/basic/06_Directives.html#%E4%BB%8B%E7%B4%B9https://quip.com/M2eCAQo6bXh8https://vuejs.org/v2/guide/installation.html

posts.title: weatherMap
posts.text: A Taiwan weather map create by Vue.js. demo https://s.codepen.io/becomegood0308/debug/GbyNVM/NjMYzqbKOjDr codepen: https://codepen.io/becomegood0308/pen/GbyNVM svg name and get id/data-name data regular expressions json data array Vue.js / jQuery vobj = vm vm.filter = <p id=""> 參考資料https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eHrGB5EHtF4
